mapper.sql: fs.id, fs.gid, fs.sku_id, fs.stock, fs.current_price, fs.shows, fs.show_time, fs.activity_time, fs.flash_status
mapper.select: select fs.id, fs.gid, fs.sku_id skuId, fs.stock, fs.current_price currentPrice, fs.shows, fs.show_time showTime, fs.activity_time activityTime, fs.flash_status flashStatus from flash_sale fs where fs.id=#{id}

SELECT ,g.name g_name,g.path g_path,k.properties_value k_properties_value from flash_sale fs LEFT JOIN goods g on fs.gid=g.id LEFT JOIN goods_sku k on fs.sku_id = k.id where fs.shows=1 order by fs.show_time desc limit #{from}, #{size}
mapper.update: update flash_sale fs set fs.stock = #{stock} where fs.id = #{id}
